article.Heading: Budget 2016: Expect budget to focus on infra & capital spend, says Memani
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan, Sanjay Reddy, VC, GVK Power & Infrastructure, Sumit Mazumder, President of CII and Rajiv Memani of EY expressed and discussed their expectations on Arun Jaitely's Union Budget.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan, Sanjay Reddy, VC, GVK Power & Infrastructure, Sumit Mazumder, President of CII and Rajiv Memani of EY expressed and discussed their expectations on Arun Jaitely's Union Budget.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying video.
